attribution: Used with permission from UCLES, AO Level Physics, June 1989, Paper 1, Question 1.
title: Powerful Stuff

answer.value:
The correct answer is (c). This can be seen from 
$\valuedef{P}{\vtr {F}\cdot \vtr {v}}{}$
 or a similar formula which gives power; the units of 
$\vari{F}$
 are 
$\quantity{}{N}$
, and the units of 
$\vari{v}$
 are 
$\quantity{}{m\,  s\sup {-1}}$
.

children.value: Which of the following is a unit of power?
